Xintian county in Yongzhou 永州[Yong3 zhou1], Hunan

sentences.english: We are the fans of Nitta Youka from China.
sentences.chinese: 我們是來自中國的新田老師的漫畫迷。

sentences.english: The people of Xintian have taken me in as one of their own.
sentences.chinese: 新田的人們已經把我當成了他們中的一員。

sentences.english: The society of Xintian has educated me a lot.
sentences.chinese: 新田的社會教會了我很多東西。

sentences.english: He claimed descent from the Minamoto clan by way of the Nitta family.
sentences.chinese: 他又自稱是新田一族的源氏後裔。
